scenes.motionDescription: Slow dolly forward toward the desk, candle flames flickering, dust motes drifting in the light

scenes.endVisualDescription: Close-up of the same decree, the red wax seal now cracked and fragments sparkling, a few gold coins shifted, light emphasizing the broken seal
scenes.motionDescription: Subtle push-in on the seal, wax fragments shimmering, a coin nudges forward
